Title: Capturing the Unknown
Description:
Heya, $n, there are strange cave paintings and other artifacts all over the cavern.

Do you think you could use your belt-mounted KTC Snapflash camera to capture images at the designated spots? Also, snap a pic of the altar in the back of the cavern.

I'm sure that Sassy will want the intel.
ObjectivesText: Using your KTC Snapflash, capture images at the bouncing cameras of the three cave paintings and the pygmy altar.
RewardText:
What are these?

<Sassy examines the pictures while listening to your tale from the Kaja'mite cavern.>

Clearly that pygmy witchdoctor is from some new race never seen before. Maybe we should call them $n-ians?

They must be the ones that painted all of that stuff in the cavern. I'm not sure that I like what you're describing.

It sounds to me like they're paintings of them and us on an island with an exploding volcano!
